body.name: NETGEAR 4-Stream WiFi 6 Router (R6700AX) – AX1800 Wireless Speed (Up to 1.8 Gbps) | Coverage up to 1,500 sq. ft., 20 devices

FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 8 mins
features: Coverage up to 1,500 sq. ft. for 20 devices.WiFi Range : Small to medium homes. WiFi Band : Simultaneous Dual Band 2.4 & 5GHz
Fast AX1800 Gigabit speed with WiFi 6 technology for uninterrupted streaming, HD video gaming, and web conferencing
Connects to your existing cable modem and replaces your WiFi router. Compatible with any internet service provider up to 1Gbps including cable, satellite, fiber, and DSL
Plug in computers, game consoles, streaming players, and more with 4 x 1G Ethernet ports
Sets up in minutes with the Nighthawk App; easily manage WiFi settings, test internet speed, and monitor data usage
NETGEAR Armor protects your family's WiFi with an automatic shield of security across all your connected devices with a 30-day free trial
NETGEAR Smart Parental Controls promotes healthy Internet habits, fosters responsibility and builds trust with your kids (30-day free trial included)
Backed by a 1-year limited hardware warranty
body.description: The NETGEAR 4-Stream AX1800 WiFi 6 Router, built with the latest generation WiFi 6 technology, provides greater capacity to handle more devices on your network and speeds up to 1.8Gbps ensuring that you can enjoy blazing fast internet connections on all your devices. This next-gen router is recommended for a small to medium home, up to 1,500 sq. ft., with 20 or more connected devices. Powerful quad-core processor ensures superior performance for concurrent real-time applications such as multimedia streaming, online gaming and audio/video chats.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Simultaneously Stream Everything at Fast Speed Now you can enjoy uninterrupted movies, gaming, video calls and more on all your devices, all at the same time. Connect a House Full of WiFi Devices Without Compromise R6700AX’s 4 WiFi streams deliver high performance and reliability for 20 smart home devices. WiFi 6 Gives Faster Speeds for Your Needs Blazing WiFi speeds up to 1.8Gbps let you download, stream and transfer 1.5X faster than ever before.

Supports Fiber & Internet Plans up to 1Gbps R6700AX’s 4 WiFi streams deliver high performance and reliability for up to 20 smart home devices. Essential Internet Security & Smart Parental Controls NETGEAR Armor protects your family's WiFi with an automatic shield of security across all your connected devices. Smart Parental Controls provide a safe, online experience for your kids. Both include a 30-day free trial. Easy Setup & Management The Nighthawk App makes it a snap to set up your router and get more out of your WiFi, including great features like Internet speed test, remote access to your network, internet pausing and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars top rated wifi router
reviews.reviewText: one of the best routers on the market for high speed wi-fi up to 500 mbps . nighthawk app walks you through super easy install . great for hi speed internet on 20+ streaming devices. great range for residential home. multi -ethernet ports. onboard cpu for routing traffic priorities. this is a awesome router and the nighthawk app makes it all gel and click. also 1 free year of armor and bitdefender included. great price on this router that can do it all. netgear got this one right!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, good coverage and strong signal. Nice phone app set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast. Router works well, management app is handy
reviews.reviewText: This router replaced a router that was destroyed by lightning. It took a little getting used; the app was new to me being accustomed to viewing the router settings from a computer interface, but once queued up, it worked well and is proving useful. Had a little trouble re-connecting Brother printers, if you have those, READ AND CAREFULLY FOLLOW BROTHER'S INSTRUCTIONS, USING BROTHERS TOOLS, or you will have a lot of trouble. Any way, once configured the router is fast and steady with plenty of capacity. I hope it will be more resistant to lightning, than the other two I have lost. I did not get the security plan, I DO NOT NEED ANY MORE PEOPLE RUNNING TO ME WANTING MORE MONEY. THANKS ANYWAY. BUT IF YOU WANT IT- HELP YOURSELF.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was easy to set up and worked great until a few days after the 30 day return window
reviews.reviewText: This had virtually no set up instructions, but I just swapped cords from the old one into the new one and somehow it worked-- YAY! Great signal, worked like a charm until it didn't. It could have been a power surge, but it was plugged into a surge protector and nothing else was impacted. I thought I might still be in the return window, but I ordered on Sept 21, started using it on Sept 25 and now on Oct 31 I find that I need to buy a new router. Bummer. Not 100% sure if its a bad product or not, since it did work great for about 5 1/2 weeks. I'd rate it 5 stars for the 5.5 weeks, but 1 star for dying so quickly. To be fair, gracious, I'm settling on a 4 star review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation and set-up.
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded my in-house WiFi and my provider recommended this brand and model. It basically installed itself, and I am happy with the coverage. Excellent overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My Wi-Fi never has been good and always hung around 95 Mbs down and 15 Mns up. I have notice that I was starting to have some lag time on some movies on Prime. I looked through the specs and this one looked good and the price was right. Installation wasn't too bad and was done in 30 minutes. When I ran a speed check on my phone, I couldn't believe the difference. Upload was 30Mps and the download was 299Mbs. I ran it 4 times to make sure and it went up every time up to 310Mbs. House is a little over 2,000 sq.ft. and there was not very much drop off anywhere in the house. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (6)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb Wi-Fi 6 router
reviews.reviewText: For the price and feature set, Netgear is hard to beat. This is the second one I’ve acquired, this one refreshed, in like new condition. I use them as access points for a slightly more robust Netgear RAX50. All works very well together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The router is fine and does what it should do
reviews.reviewText: Once the router is configured it works great! Netgear recommends using a Nighthawk app to set it up, that didn't work because it wouldn't connect. I downloaded the app, plug my name, email and phone in and the app couldn't connect to the router. Instead, I got a phone call from someone claiming to be the Tech Support. Needless to say, this person was useless and couldn't address the issue. I tried again next day and received another phone call. This time the person was pushy and rude, and at some point told me to "stop wasting his time" and return the router. He also claimed that someone got ahold of my password and there already 30 devises connected to the router and that's the limit. Then he offered to flash my router for additional money and when I refused and said that I'll instead consult my friend who's a network engineer, the "tech support" got mad and got offended that I didn't trust him with his "expertise". But again, the router once my buddy helped me to set it up properly, works like a charm.
